::Zdorab:: Hm, energon? Well�� He scratches the back of his neck
uncomfortably. �Sure, but it depends on the purity and density. We mostly
barter with people on the front lines.� He taps some keys on his data pad.
�Here.� He places the pad on the ground and a light shoots out of it to
about chest level where a holographic projection manifests in the form of a
terminal with a very large screen. �Look over our inventory, tell me if
there�s anything you think you or your people could use, and we�ll figure
something out, eh? And if nothing catches your eye, we could always build
just about any weapon you could need� for a price of course.�

The Inventory list read as follows:

1,702 Marc 5 fusion pistols (15mm energon shell, cap 100)
